channel.title: Comments on: Gorillaz is finished making records

item.title: By: Damon Albarn and Jamie Hewlett replace Gorillaz with Chinese monkey opera
item.dc:creator: Damon Albarn and Jamie Hewlett replace Gorillaz with Chinese monkey opera
item.description: [...] Albarn all but proclaimed Gorillaz dead, he and Hewlett have been hard at work on their next venture- an ancient Chinese folk tale in [...]
